about_the_game:
In 202X, a deadly male virus broke out globally, causing a large number of deaths among men in countries with poor prevention and control measures. One year later, a new type of virus B broke out in New York City, A country, targeting everyone. Most infected individuals would die and mutate into zombies. As a special agent from a major Asian country, the commander you were dispatched to investigate virus related incidents in Country A. On the surface, you are running a small North American mercenary branch as a manager of an international security company. For the survival of the company and the interests of the country, move forward.

Dual track propulsion

On the surface, you need to do various tasks for the growth of security companies and the prevention and control of the epidemic. On the surface, you also need to act as a special agent to avoid layers of arrests and complete corresponding tasks, otherwise the FBI will discover and arrest you.

Recruit your soldiers

Draw cards, but no recharge. Use the funds drawn from the card to earn from your own tasks. Due to the large number of male deaths in society and the economic downturn, a large number of women have begun to enter the military and police industry. But the soldiers here are truly dead, so love will disappear. Please cherish the time when they are still alive, or treat them as consumables in order to survive.

Equip your soldiers

Due to the requirements of the new version of the Civil Security Personnel Management Act, employees of companies are not allowed to equip with high destructive weapons. However, in special circumstances, the military can default to supplying a small amount of military equipment, even military vehicles, through the black market.

Turn based strategic combat

Consider every step carefully, missing a task can accelerate infection and even lead to the failure of the entire epidemic prevention and control operation.

Map meat pigeon

The map for each battle is randomly generated based on the characteristics of the region.

Upgrade Meat Pigeon

The character upgrade attribute enhancement plan is meat pigeon, and everyone has a full personality.

Network requirements

Due to force majeure reasons, there may be login issues with the game account. If you encounter the inability to log in to the Huanjing account, you can disconnect the network and continue playing the game. There are two ways to disconnect from the network: 1. Open the Windows network settings and disable the network adapter; 2. Unplug the network cable. After STEAM enters offline mode, you can directly enter the game to start playing.
